text:
There are a lot of JMeter properties that are documented in jmeter.properties.
Creating a web page would be useful.
Ideally properties documentation should be organized by domain.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
